junit.framework

接口 TestListener

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BaseTestRunner, ResultPrinter, TestRunner

    public interface TestListener
    A Listener for test progress

      void addFailure(Test test, AssertionFailedError e)
      A failure occurred.
      void endTest(Test test)
      A test ended.
      void startTest(Test test)
